suggestedActivities.suggestedActivityName: Volvo cars uses SharePoint Add-ins to improve efficiency and agility of its intranet
suggestedActivities.description: Volvo Cars used farm solutions to create its own business applications, which could not be run on Microsoft SharePoint Online. To increase the functionality of its business applications, the Volvo development team retired its farm solutions and migrated their custom farm solutions to SharePoint Add-ins with service-oriented architecture. With guidance from the Office 365 Developer Patterns and Practices initiative, Volvo Cars has experienced an increase in the ease and efficiency of business application deployment
